GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Drop snd_BUG_ON() from snd_usbmidi_output_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit 00f5f1bbf815a39e9eecb468d12ca55d3360eb10. For more details please see the references link.
